00035 #include "Vec3.h"
00036 #include <vector>
00037 #include "internal/windowsExport.h"
00038 
00039 namespace OpenMM {
00040 
00041 class OPENMM_EXPORT Force;
00042 class OPENMM_EXPORT VirtualSite;
00043 
00066 class OPENMM_EXPORT System {
00067 public:
00071     System();
00072     ~System();
00076     int getNumParticles() const {
00077         return masses.size();
00078     }
00088     int addParticle(double mass) {
00089         masses.push_back(mass);
00090         return masses.size()-1;
00091     }
00100     double getParticleMass(int index) const;
00110     void setParticleMass(int index, double mass);
00120     void setVirtualSite(int index, VirtualSite* virtualSite);
00126     bool isVirtualSite(int index) const {
00127         return (index < virtualSites.size() && virtualSites[index] != NULL);
00128     }
00135     const VirtualSite& getVirtualSite(int index) const;
00139     int getNumConstraints() const {
00140         return constraints.size();
00141     }
00151     int addConstraint(int particle1, int particle2, double distance);
00160     void getConstraintParameters(int index, int& particle1, int& particle2, double& distance) const;
00170     void setConstraintParameters(int index, int particle1, int particle2, double distance);
00179     int addForce(Force* force) {
00180         forces.push_back(force);
00181         return forces.size()-1;
00182     }
00186     int getNumForces() const {
00187         return forces.size();
00188     }
00194     const Force& getForce(int index) const;
00200     Force& getForce(int index);
00213     void getDefaultPeriodicBoxVectors(Vec3& a, Vec3& b, Vec3& c) const;
00226     void setDefaultPeriodicBoxVectors(const Vec3& a, const Vec3& b, const Vec3& c);
00227 private:
00228     class ConstraintInfo;
00229     Vec3 periodicBoxVectors[3];
00230     std::vector<double> masses;
00231     std::vector<ConstraintInfo> constraints;
00232     std::vector<Force*> forces;
00233     std::vector<VirtualSite*> virtualSites;
00234 };
00235 
00240 class System::ConstraintInfo {
00241 public:
00242     int particle1, particle2;
00243     double distance;
00244     ConstraintInfo() {
00245         particle1 = particle2 = -1;
00246         distance = 0.0;
00247     }
00248     ConstraintInfo(int particle1, int particle2, double distance) :
00249         particle1(particle1), particle2(particle2), distance(distance) {
00250     }
00251 };

00253 } // namespace OpenMM
